description: Variation of condition 1 (Approved Plans) and 16 (Obscure Glazing) of planning permission 15/07269/S73 dated 25/01/16 for 'Amendments to planning permission B/04398/13 dated 10/12/2013 for Demolition of existing buildings and erection of 1no. two storey building, with rooms in roof-space to provide 9 flats and office floor space.' Variation to include amendment of the wording of condition 16 from 'Before the building hereby permitted is occupied the proposed windows at first floor level and above in the south elevation facing the properties which front Leicester Road shall be glazed with obscure glass and shall be permanently retained as such thereafter and shall be permanently fixed shut with only a fanlight opening' to 'The windows in the first floor level and above in the south elevation facing the properties which front Leicester Road shall be glazed in accordance with the details shown on drawings 22053A/10 Rev T3, 22053A/21 Rev C5, 22053A/22 Rev D4, 22053A/23 Rev C5, 22053A/24 Rev C3 and 22053A/26 Rev C2 and shall be permanently retained as such thereafter'
